3. Jal Beach: Located about 20 kilometers south of Vlorë, Jal Beach is a wide stretch of golden sand that's perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and water sports.

4. Orikum Beach: To the north of Vlorë is Orikum Beach, a popular spot for locals and tourists alike. It has a mix of sandy and rocky areas, as well as a lively promenade with restaurants and cafes.

5. Dhermi Beach: Though a bit further from the city, Dhermi Beach is definitely worth the trip. It's considered one of the most beautiful beaches in Albania, with crystal-clear turquoise waters and stunning cliffside views.

Each of these beaches has its own unique charm and beauty, so you might want to visit a few during your trip to Vlorë.
